data.title: Aisha Tyler - Joy, a Podcast. Hosted by Craig Ferguson
meta_keywords: a Podcast. Hosted by Craig Ferguson
data.meta_description:
In Craig’s words 'Aisha Tyler is so cool I’m always aghast that she agrees to hang out with me. Come share her elegance, poise and intelligence and my (a)ghastliness on this weeks Joy.”  Check out Aisha’s new cocktail company losophe and catch her on new season of Criminal Minds premiering June 6th. EnJOY! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
data.text:
In Craig’s words "Aisha Tyler is so cool I’m always aghast that she agrees to hang out with me. Come share her elegance, poise and intelligence and my (a)ghastliness on this weeks Joy.” Check out Aisha’s new cocktail company losophe and catch her on new season of Criminal Minds premiering June 6th. EnJOY!
